column1: In the second edition of The Lord of the Rings
column2: Samwise Gamgees year of birth was added to Appendix B as 2963.  This contradicted both the Longfather Tree of Master Samwise and a later entry in The Tale of Years.
column3: S.R. 1469 The incorrect date has been corrected (to ) in the The Lord of the Rings (50th Anniversary Edition). See also The Lord of the Rings: A Readers Companion
